GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS AMPHIBIOUS INFANTRY COMMANDO SCORE UNIQUE_UNIT SKIRMISH_AI_DONT_GARRISON IGNORE_FORCE_MOVE CAN_PLACE_CHARGE SNIPER CAN_BE_FAVORITE_UNIT PATH_THROUGH_INFANTRY PRELOAD FS_RADAR

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_CINA" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromCINA") elseif Prev == "STATE_Suppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromSuppressed") elseif Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") elseif Prev == "STATE_SelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ParachuteLaunch" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toParachuting") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_Suppressed" and Prev ~= "TRANS_toSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toSuppressed") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_OverWater" and Prev ~= "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ToWater") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_OverWater" or Prev == "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_FromWater") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end

DieMuxData.DeathTypesForbidden: ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED MAULED
BITTEN ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
BITTEN ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
